definitions.text: the property of holding together and retaining its shape
examples: wool has more body than rayon
when the dough has enough consistency it is ready to bake

definitions.text: a harmonious uniformity or agreement among things or parts
logical coherence and accordance with the facts
examples: a rambling argument that lacked any consistency

definitions.text: (logic) an attribute of a logical system that is so constituted that none of the propositions deducible from the axioms contradict one another
